attributes.action: Support  a no confidence motion against current autocratic and hypocritic Speaker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent behaviour (and earlier) of the House of Commons Speaker Michael Martin (aka Gorbels Mick) raises fundamental issues like, is this man fit to hold such an important post of the realm?

Never mind claiming his wife's taxi fare the man does not even allow other MPs to raise the issue of their colleagues' expense claims. Everybody knows where Michael Martin's interests and fears lie. That is why he wants to silence whistle blowers from the fees office who act in the interests of tax payers.

The Prime Minister should do the honourable thing and seek to oust this Speaker who brings the House and the Labour Party into disrepute.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
